pages.text: Relax! You shouldn't have to worry about temperatures. Machines should only heat up to explosion if you're inputting more energy than it's input limit.$(br)However, machines do have a temperature where they are more efficient and thus, processing is faster. After reaching this temperature, it should stagnate for as long as it's functioning.

Note that once the machine hits it's most efficient temperature, it will start cooling down for a while and during this the process speed boosting won't be active. To avoid this, check out $(l:temperature/coolers_and_fans)$(t:Go to Keeping it Cool!)Keeping it cool!$()$(br2)If the machine stops processing, the temperature will slowly start to decrease to the ambient temperature.
